text: During the RNC, speaker after speaker worked to rehabilitate President Trump’s image — that he’s not racist and he’s a uniter. But over the course of his 70-minute acceptance speech on Thursday, Trump made it clear: Take it or leave it, he is who he is. https://t.co/ZiZ9FUiAOn
